title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.1 - Approval of liquor authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 69.1 - Approval of liquor authority

State Regulations
(a) Application for permission to inaugurate or retain such methods or practices
must be made in writing to the Wholesale Bureau of the State Liquor Authority
at its New York City office. (b) Such application must set forth the address of the central or main office of
such licensee at which centralized records pertaining to the operations of the
several separately licensed premises shall be maintained and be available for
inspection by any authorized representative of the Liquor Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
69.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
